title: T206 x 115... Demmitt STL, Cobb's, Matty, Johnson, etc.. (BREAKING UP LOT FS/FT)
author: kllrbee

posts.post_title: T206 x 115... Demmitt STL, Cobb's, Matty, Johnson, etc.. (BREAKING UP LOT FS/FT)
posts.post_content:
I have a 115 card lot of dupes that Id like to sell in one shot.
Includes Demmitt/Stl, 16 Hof's, and 98 commons.  Lots of PB backs.

I know you guys like to have a price, but Im a relative newbie at selling so Im going to let you decide what it is worth.
So this will be a BEST OFFER type of sale.

I have a figure in mind, and if an offer reaches that figure, I will sell.  If not, I will break up and sell individually and in smaller lots.  But as of right now, this is being sold as a lot only.  

Email me only with offers.  No PM please.  

I will keep all interested parties updated on where the best offer stands. 

Please be patient with me as far as replies, as I work 5pm-3am (while most of you are at work, I am home and vice versa).  

I will accept offers until about Tuesday or until I havent recieved a new offer for 24 hours.

[url]thauswirth01@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Please feel free to contact me with any and all questions (except "will you sell "so and so" individually).

Front and back scans can be seen at the link below.

[url]http://s1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/kllrbee69/T206%20x%20115/?start=all[/url]


Also, for ease of viewing link, Demmitt and Hof's are shown first, then the commons in alphabetical order.

Thanks Net 54 and everyone for looking!!

[quote name="kllrbee" post=886772]

Email me only with offers.  No PM please.[/QUOTE]

[quote name="Bamacollection" post=886789]PM sent.[/QUOTE]

:eek:

Going a different direction and now offering anything for sale or trade individually.  Make your best offers.

Please Email only!!

Sales will be PP+3 (or gift), check or MO.

Need 90 or so cards to complete my 520 so here is my wantlist.

Feel free to contact me with any trade or sale offers or any questions you might have.

Thanks Net 54!!

For all those contacting me, thanks.
Please be patient as I have to go to work tonite. I will be able to devote alot of time to offers tomorrow.
Thanks everyone.
